overview:
Jack Harvey became Interim President and Chief Executive Officer of NRTC after the retirement of Bob Phillips, who had held the position for 23 years. Harvey leads a team of professionals and staff dedicated to the cooperativeâ€™s mission of bringing advanced telecommunications solutions to strengthen member businesses and improve the quality of life in rural America.

Prior to becoming Interim President and CEO, Harvey was Senior Vice President of Business Operations for NRTC and provided technical and operational leadership to all of NRTCâ€™s Utility Solutions, Video Services and Internet Services divisions. In this position, he maintained relationships with NRTCâ€™s multiple business partners to expand and grow NRTCâ€™s business units in support of both telco and electric members.

relationships.title: Interim President and Chief Executive Officer
